text: Louis Santerre (born 26 May 1959) is a Canadian former wrestler who competed in the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Olympic wrestlers of Canada Category:Wrestlers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Canadian male sport wrestlers Category:Pan American Games medalists in wrestling Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Canada Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Canada Category:Wrestlers at the 1979 Pan American Games Category:Wrestlers at the 1983 Pan American Games
title: Louis Santerre
